hero.title: About AnyRide
hero.subtitle: Moving people and livelihoods safely, locally, reliably.
hero.description: AnyRide connects riders with verified drivers using both cars and motorcycles. Built for everyday movement commuting, errands, short trips with a focus on safety, fairness, and local realities.

whatWeDo.title: What is AnyRide?
whatWeDo.description: AnyRide is more than just another ride-hailing app — it's a movement built around freedom, trust, and everyday convenience. We started AnyRide with one simple goal: to make movement across cities easier, safer, and more rewarding for everyone — whether you're catching a quick ride or earning behind the wheel. We understand what it means to hustle, to move, and to make things happen — that's why AnyRide was created to serve real people with real needs. Our platform connects riders and drivers in seconds, helping both sides save time, earn more, and move confidently through their day.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.subtitle: The vision is to go global
vision.description: To build Africa's most trusted local mobility network — one that puts people, not just technology, at the center. We're not just creating rides; we're building bridges between people, opportunities, and safer streets.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: We are here just for you
mission.description: To redefine local transportation by making every trip effortless, affordable, and empowering — for both riders and drivers. We believe that movement should never be stressful, unsafe, or overpriced. Everyone deserves a ride that's fair, transparent, and easy to trust.

bothModes.title: Why both
bothModes.subtitle: Cars and motorcycles aren't competing — they're complementary.
bothModes.description: In many cities, motorcycles are not an alternative — they're essential. AnyRide supports both, giving riders choice and drivers opportunity.

whereWeOperate.title: Where we operate
whereWeOperate.subtitle: Active today. Expanding thoughtfully.
whereWeOperate.description: We only list regions we can support — to keep trust high and expectations clear.

forEveryone.description: One platform — different needs. Equal focus.

riders.title: Riders
riders.description: Your city is just a few taps away. AnyRide gives you control over how you move — from quick errands to long trips. See your fare upfront, track your driver live, and enjoy peace of mind knowing you're in safe hands. No surprises. No stress.

drivers.title: Drivers
drivers.description: We see the drivers as partners, not just users. With AnyRide, you choose when to drive, how you earn, and what vehicle you use. Switch cars easily, cash out instantly, and grow your income without the usual pressure. Our system is built to support you — every step, every ride.

ourPromise.title: Take our words for it
ourPromise.description: We're creating something different — a ride-hailing experience that feels local, fair, and human. From our drivers who keep cities moving, to riders who trust us daily, AnyRide stands for safety, honesty, and empowerment. Because movement is freedom — and everyone deserves access to it. That's AnyRide. Built for people. Made for the move.
